group_1.textLeft: How much longer [flashEffect:flashWhite1][5002_shooting_02_s]are you@going to keep up this charade?
(It's doing nothing but @dodging all of my attacks!)
(It's not even trying to @land a serious blow...)

group_1.textRight: Yah!!!

group_1.textLeft: (Does it plan to keep up this@frail girl act to the very end?)
(This fight will either end with you showing@your true face, or with me giving up...)
Two of the most powerful Magical Girls in@Kamihama are just sittin' around, watchin'?

group_1.textRight: Momoko!
Why are you here?

group_1.textLeft: I just came by to help you guys out,@only to find you like this!
This's the most astonishing@development of the week!

group_1.textRight: (Another supporter...?@[chara:200500:motion_100]Is it brainwashing her too?)

group_1.textLeft: What're you two doin' just watchin'?!
Wait… Hold on.@What the heck happened to you guys?!

group_1.textRight: (But I don't see a Witch's Kiss anywhere.)
I've been fighting...a lot...
Same here...@My magic tank is on empty...
(She is not like these two...)
(She didn't spend all this time in close@quarters with the Witch, and yet...)
(This Witch disguised as a human...)
(Does it have a unique way of controlling@humans…?)

group_1.textLeft: Hey you! Yeah you!@You did this?!

group_1.textRight: Huh?!
No, wait.@You have it all wrong!

group_1.textLeft: No need to explain.@I see exactly what's goin' on here.
Like they say, seein' is believin'.

group_1.textRight: Tsk...
(...All of them are completely...@under the Witch's control...)
(I'm outnumbered... My chances@of winning are exceedingly low right now…)
(...Looks like I will have to withdraw...@[chara:200500:motion_0]You win this round, Witch.)
I should probably withdraw at this point...

group_1.textLeft: I'm not really sure what's goin' on here,@but if you're gonna leave, then leave.
I'll give you to the count of ten.

group_1.textRight: Just remember, I am not your enemy.
My only enemy is that Witch over@there... Disguising itself as a human.
I'll take my leave now...@Until next time.
She said she was from Mitakihara, right?
What's someone from so far @away doing in Kamihama City?
